meanings.definition: A substance used to give flavor to food or drink.
meanings.sent1: I added some flavoring to the soup to make it taste better.
meanings.sent2: The vanilla flavoring made the cake delicious.
meanings.sent3: The flavoring danced on my taste buds like a joyful melody.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was the flavoring that brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The flavoring was like a burst of sunshine in my mouth.

meanings.definition: The characteristic taste of a food or drink.
meanings.sent1: The flavoring of the strawberries was sweet and juicy.
meanings.sent2: I love the flavoring of fresh oranges.
meanings.sent3: The flavoring of the ice cream was so good, it made me want to dance.
meanings.sent4: His words had a bitter flavoring that lingered in the air.
meanings.sent5: The flavoring of the coffee awakened my senses.
